About me

Passioned about all things physics, maths, and tech

Five things you should know about me:

  1. I am passionate about all things physics, maths, and tech!
  2. I am currently a Mathematics graduate student at King’s College London.
  3. In 2017 I graduated from Royal Holloway, University of London with a First Class Honours degree in Physics.
  4. I have research experience in theoretical statistical mechanics and molecular dynamics.
  5. I have acquired a comprehensive set of computing skills for scientific computing, data analysis, and web development.
